text: I could be wrong but I thought there honestly already is
when you go to the help widget, it generally always shows phone, chat, or ticket
only during certain times is phone disabled
not for Marketing Starter i got told that i am not entitled for phone support
yes but for me the only thing that is not disabled is ticket
which can be a pretty frustrating experience

I can understand that.

Wondering, when you get on a ticket with them is the person speaking German or English.

I don’t know anything here I’m just speculating that maybe because you are over in Germany that they may have it set so you talk only with German language support people. I see that being something that could be improved if someone is in your case where you are multi-lingual.
:bulb: add a callback to the Schedule a Meeting embed so submissions can be tracked as conversions on PPC ads or what have you.
